actions.text: On agreeing to the McAllister amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 284 (Roll no. 371).

description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Corps of Engineers Flood Damage Reduction projects in the Mississippi River Valley below Cape Girardeau, Missouri by $47 million and reduce funding for Renewable Energy Programs Construction by $127 million.
purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Corps of Engineers Flood Damage Reduction projects in the Mississippi River Valley below Cape Girardeau, Missouri by $47 million and to reduce funding for Renewable Energy Programs Construction by $127 million.
